node.text:
This week's #SongsWithDuo features London-based rap artist @kadiata93 singing "Happy Birthday" in Portuguese! 🥳🎂

Shoutout to Kadiata fans @sharkkana, @tenhush, and @oscarworldpeace, who have birthdays around this time. Know others with a July birthday? Tag them in the comments!

node.text:
Remember your favorite childhood song? 🧸 🥰

This week we’re throwing it back for #SongsWithDuo! London-based musician Joviale performs “Dans la forêt lointaine” – a special song she’d sing with her younger siblings.

node.text:
Our last pre-quarantine memories were pretty sweet, huh? 💭 
For this week's #SongsWithDuo, blues musician @adiavictoria reminisces about the delicious honey she ate in Paris in a brand-new original French song, titled “Le goût du miel." 🍯 🐝

node.title: Songs with Duo, Episode 3: “Le goût du miel"

node.text:
One universal language we can all understand is music!

Each week, #SongsWithDuo will feature multilingual musicians from around the world who bring their own flair to classic and original tunes. Today, we have @milesfromkinshasa performing “Could We Just Talk Instead?”

node.title: Songs with Duo, Episode 2: "Could We Just Talk Instead?"

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Duolingo on September 17, 2021. May be a cartoon of ‎one or more people and ‎text that says '‎m e ㅂㅂ 얘 워 캐 도 سب fan art friday‎'‎‎.

node.text:
When life (or your lessons) get hard, you can always count on Duo to give you a hand! 💚 

Thank you InuHoshiArtNews on Twitter for this uplifting #DuoFanArt. Submit yours for a chance to be featured!

Today marks the beginning of Hispanic Heritage Month! 🙌 

To kick off, we're exploring a language topic of interest to Spanish learners, Spanish speakers, and all language enthusiasts in between: Spanglish! 

Curious to learn more? 🔗 Check out the link in our bio! 🔗

Thanks to @mud_and_monsters for this #DuoFanArt!

Share yours for a chance to be featured next.

Sign us up to be part of this squad! ✋

Thank you to @averildraws for this lovely #DuoFanArt! Have fan art of your own? Share it with us for a chance to be featured!

node.text: We’re more savage on Twitter 🤷‍♀️

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Duolingo on September 01, 2021. May be a cartoon of text that says '2 SEPTEMBER Junior's School Trip'.

node.text:
Junior’s school supply list includes all the basics...and a frog (of course). 🐸 
 
Get into the back-to-school mindset with our September Monthly Challenge – now available on iOS & Android! 📱 
 
Every month, we'll release a special challenge to help you build a long-term habit to learn more effectively! 🕰️
 
Perk of completing the challenge? Once you hit 1000 XP you get an ✨exclusive ✨ badge! Who’s in?

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Duolingo on August 30, 2021. May be a cartoon of text that says 'Introducing Family Plan!'.

node.text:
Families come in all shapes and sizes – whether you define family as your closest friends or your siblings and parents! 👯‍♀️

Duolingo Family Plan – available on iOS and Android – is here to bring everyone closer: just add 6 accounts all under 1 plan. 🚀 💙

🏆 If that sounds enticing, we’re sweetening the deal with a giveaway. If you haven’t had Duolingo Plus before, here’s your chance!

To be eligible to win a Family Plan for your friends or family…

1️⃣ Tag 5 people who you want to share the Family Plan with
2️⃣ Share your Duolingo username
3️⃣ Make sure you're following @duolingo

*Giveaway ends 12:00 PM ET on September 1, and 20 total prizes will be awarded. We will DM winners!*

To read more about Family Plan, check out the link in our bio!

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Duolingo on August 27, 2021. May be a cartoon of 1 person and text that says 'D D fan art friday'.

node.text:
And on this episode of “Chillin’ with Bea and Lin”, we spill the tea. ☕ 📺

furryspart on Twitter did an awesome job with this #DuoFanArt!

node.text:
If these Duolingo characters could talk...

Well, now they do! At #Duocon, we revealed custom text-to-speech voices for each character, from Bea to Zari & everyone in between. 🔊 Sound on to hear them! 🔊

Read about how we gave voices to our characters at the link in our bio!

Learners in our English courses can now hear all the characters' voices in their lessons! 🙌  If you’re learning Spanish or French, some of the voices have already been added, and the rest will be added soon. Also coming soon: German and Japanese voices! 🇩🇪🇯🇵

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Duolingo on August 20, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'duo duocon con Tune in today!'.

node.text:
What do @trevornoah and @pattonoswalt have in common... besides being funny?

You can catch them both at #Duocon, the language event of the year! 💚

The fun begins at 11 AM ET TODAY – tune in at the link in our bio! 📺

node.accessibility_caption: Photo by Duolingo on August 19, 2021. May be an image of text that says 'DUOLINGO NOW Hey! It's Bea! Dr. Jessi Grieser (my idol!) will talking about language and belonging at Duocon. Be there! be'.

node.text:
Ever wonder how the way we talk signals where we’re from or what groups we’re part of? 🤔🗣️

Don't miss @jessgrieser's talk about language and belonging at #Duocon TOMORROW. 💚

🔗 Register at the link in our bio!
